title: Ralph-Beads v0.1.0 Implementation
description:
## Goal
Implement the ralph-beads Claude Code plugin based on specifications in specs/.

## Specs to Implement
- specs/loop-architecture.md - Core architecture (bd prime, circuit breaker, molecules)
- specs/core-workflow.md - Planning/building modes
- specs/beads-integration.md - Task selection, logging, state
- specs/commands.md - Slash commands

## Development Approach
Use spec-driven development:
1. Read specs for acceptance criteria
2. Create child tasks from criteria
3. Implement and validate
4. Close when all criteria met

## Key Features
- bd prime context reload every iteration
- Molecule-based workflow execution
- Circuit breaker (block after 2 failures)
- Wisp support for discovered work
